content: X-PN G3 MX Plywood fasteners (collated) Premium collated nails for fastening plywood to steel framing using the GX 3 nailer ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Nails- - - ### FEATURES:Features With knurled shank, optimized for fastening plywood and OSB to cold-formed steel framing Faster and more productive than traditional methods using screws Unique knurling geometry for improved reliability and higher load performance One fastener length covers the most common shear wall applications involving 14-20 gauge cold-formed steel framing Applications Fastening plywood sheets to metal frames. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Base materials: Steel Minimum thickness of base material (steel): 3/16 in Corrosion protection: Galvanized zinc coated <20 µm Technical Data | Base materials | Steel | Minimum thickness of base material (steel) | 3/16 in | Corrosion protection | Galvanized zinc coated <20 µm | Environmental Conditions | Dry indoor | Material | Carbon steel | Fastener shank diameter | 0.11 in | Point type | Cut point | Approvals | ETA, ICS-ES, ITB | For use with (tools) | GX 3 | Product Class | Premium ### ITEMS- 3539466 - Plywood pin X-PN 37 G3 MX + GC 41 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 900x Plywood pin X-PN 37 G3 MX - 1x Gas can GC 41 for GX 3 - 2101549 - Plywood pin X-PN 37 G3 MX - Package Size 900 pc - 3553503 - GX3 Conv Kit X-GPN 37 MX+GC 22+GC 41 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1500x X-GPN 37 MX Fastener - 1x Gas canister GC 22 - 1x Gas can GC 41 for GX 3 - 3537446 - 27k Plywood pin X-PN 37 G3 MX + GC 41 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 27000x Plywood pin X-PN 37 G3 MX - 30x Gas can GC 41 for GX 3
